description:
Lina, Gourry and Amelia is getting closer to Saylague. In order to outrun the tenacious pursuers they try to get on a ship, but the ship is watched by the bounty hunters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Question ? Une demande en mariage à cette fille ?
Question? He`s Proposing to That Girl?
Question? あの娘?にプロポーズ!
Întrebare: O cere de nevastă pe fată?
Вопрос! Он хочет жениться на ней?
